title: E20 Experts with Tom Nichols
itunes:title: Experts with Tom Nichols
description:
In this episode, the team discusses being an expert with author of "The Death of Expertise: The Campaign Against Established Knowledge and Why it Matters", Tom Nichols.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
